TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TemplateContainerAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TemplateContainerAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TemplateContainerAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 声明属性的容器控件的基类型，该属性返回 接口并用 特性进行标记。

span.span: Declares the base type of the container control of a property that returns an interface and is marked with the attribute.

summary.span: 具有 属性的控件必须实现 接口。

span.span: The control with the property must implement the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中作为参数传递的对象对象用作解析程序的一种在数据绑定表达式中使用的对象。The object that is passed in as a parameter of the object is used by the parser as the type of object that is used in data-binding expressions. 其属性返回的控件接口，并将标有，必须实现接口。The control whose property returns an interface and is marked with the , must implement the interface. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的模板化控件`TemplatedFirstControl`并将其与名为的容器`FirstTemplateContainer`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 指定模板时，这允许创建显示服务器时间时未指定模板的自定义控件和模板的内容。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the template's content when the template is specified. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.vb#1)] 以下 Web 窗体演示如何使用在前面的代码示例中创建自定义控件。The following Web form demonstrates how to use the custom control created in the preceding code example. 两个实例`TemplatedFirstControl`放置在页面上：Two instances of the `TemplatedFirstControl` are placed on the page: - 第一个实例包括模板``。The first instance includes the template ``. - 第二个实例不包括``; 因此，它显示只是时间。The second instance does not include ``; therefore, it shows just the time. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的容器类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified container type.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的模板化控件`TemplatedFirstControl`并将其与名为的容器`FirstTemplateContainer`。The following code example shows how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 指定模板时，这允许创建显示服务器时间时未指定模板的自定义控件和模板的内容。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the template's content when the template is specified. 类用于`FirstTemplate`属性。The class is used for the `FirstTemplate` property. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的容器类型和 属性初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified container type and the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BindingDirection As BindingDirection
public: property System::ComponentModel::BindingDirection BindingDirection { System::ComponentModel::BindingDirection get(); };

summary.span: 获取容器控件的绑定方向。

span.span: Gets the binding direction of the container control.

value.span: 一个 ，指示容器控件的绑定方向。

span.span: A indicating the container control's binding direction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以是字段，其中模板只会接受属性值或字段，其中模板可接受，并公开的属性值。The property can be either the field, where the template can accept only property values or the field, where the template can accept and expose property values. 在后一种方案中，数据绑定控件自动可以使用更新、 删除和插入操作的数据源使用`Bind`数据绑定语法。In the latter scenario, data-bound controls automatically can use the update, delete, and insert operations of a data source using the `Bind` data-binding syntax. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)和[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information on data binding, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的模板化控件`TemplatedFirstControl`并将其与名为的容器`FirstTemplateContainer`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 这允许显示服务器时间时未指定模板的自定义控件的创建和模板的内容时指定的模板。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the contents of the template when the template is specified. 方法确定属性`FirstTemplate`属性`TemplateFirstControl`。The method determines the property of the `FirstTemplate` property of the `TemplateFirstControl`. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/CS/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TemplateContainerAttribute/VB/templatecontainerattribute.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个名为的模板化控件`TemplatedFirstControl`并将其与名为的容器`FirstTemplateContainer`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a templated control named `TemplatedFirstControl` and associate it with a container named `FirstTemplateContainer`. 指定模板时，这允许创建显示服务器时间时未指定模板的自定义控件和模板的内容。This allows the creation of custom controls that display the server time when the template is not specified and the template's content when the template is specified. 类用于`FirstTemplate`属性和用于指定属性作为`FirstTemplateContainer`。The class is used for the `FirstTemplate` property and for specifying the property as `FirstTemplateContainer`.
